comprehensive_overview: GNU Wget is a utility for non-interactive download of files from the Web. It supports HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP protocols, as well as retrieval through HTTP proxies.
core_features:
1. Supports recursive downloading
2. Supports resuming downloads
3. Can follow links in HTML pages
4. Can be used as a spider to download a webpage and its requisites
5. Supports bandwidth limiting
6. Can be run in the background
